question: India's first-ever digitised Panchayat ward has come up in which of the following states?
explanation: Kerala has become the India's first-ever digitised Panchayat ward. Krishan Pal Gurjar (the Union minister of state for social justice and empowerment) has launched the website of the first digitalized panchayat ward No.15 of Aymanam grama panchayat "www.digitalaymanam.com".
